heading-1.description: Primarily used in the C&M, ACQ hero components.

heading-1-light.description: This style should only be used on the Acquisition Site by C&M.

heading-2-light.description: This style should only be used on the Acquisition Site by C&M.

heading-3.description: Page titles for Self Service pages. The largest text size for product.

heading-7.description: Sub-card titles, information labels, sub-sub-section titles.

heading-8.description: Sub-card titles, information labels, sub-sub-section titles.

label.description: Form field, selection, checkbox and radio labels. Information labels. Table Headers. Error states.

functional-L.description: Button text, text links, and eyebrow labels. Used in Large and Medium buttons.

functional-M.description: Button text, text links, and eyebrow labels. Used in small buttons.

body-L.description: The base paragraph size for Marketing and un-authenticated pages.

body-L-bold.description: Bold alternative for base paragraph size. Used for additional emphasis, or to create hierarchy in display text.

body-M.description: The base paragraph size for product. Secondary text size for marketing pages.

body-S.description: Secondary text for product. Tertiary for marketing.

caption.description: Smallest body text. Used for data-viz tooltips. Can be used for eyebrow text in tabular data.
